Terms of Use
Use of images for non-commercial purposes

The use of our digitally reproduced images is regulated by a Creative Commons License (CC BY-NC 3.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/). This permits the use of individual images for non-commercial purposes (particularly in the areas of education and research), as long as proper source citation is used.
This also means that you should only use DIVAservices with images that are already covered under a Creative Commons License.

Use of images for commercial purposes

Any form of commercial use or republication (publication or advertisement, in electronic or print media, company websites, commercial databases, etc.) of images or content made available by DIVAservices requires a proper source citation (see below) and the prior written permission of the manuscript owner library. If it is not possible to automatically detect the manuscript owner, please contact us.

Use of metadata

The use of metadata is protected by a Creative Commons License (CC BY 3.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/). Use of this metadata is allowed, as long as proper source citation is used.
